Summary: Disc shape 30-50ft long 20-30ft wide silver top half had port holes no sound
trends: There have been no other sightings in Newton Longville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working on a house at Newtonlongville and had coffee and smoke at bottom of garden as it looked out to open fields when from my right I saw movement it was silver in colour disc shape top half had port holes no sound watching this object flying about 20-40ft off the ground about 30-50ft long 20-30ft high and about 300-500ft away could not believe what I was seeing and not having a camera on me I ran in house to find someone or something to witness the object that was flying across the fields but to no avail This what I saw and I have only started to tell about it this year as it was in 1991-1992 oct -nov 12-16th ,the reason at time for not reporting it was who was going to believe me as had no proof. I am now 49 and would like to put it on record ( seeing is believing ) Now that communication is a lot better and phones have cameras are at hand to catch these UFOs to show they are real .
